text.__SUMMARY__: Tillandsia mallemontii is a species in the genus Tillandsia. This species is native to Brazil.
text.Cultivars:
Tillandsia 'Blue Moon'
Tillandsia 'Kia Ora'
Tillandsia 'Nezley'
Tillandsia 'Van Der Mollis'
Tillandsia 'Wo'
